mapper.select: SELECT account_identifier username, account_credential password, user_id, status, last_login_time, update_credential_time FROM sys_account WHERE account_identifier = #{username}
SELECT a.role_name FROM sys_role a INNER JOIN sys_user_role b ON a.id = b.role_id WHERE b.user_id = #{useId}
SELECT a.permission_name FROM sys_permission a, sys_permission_role b, sys_user_role c WHERE c.user_id = #{useId} AND c.role_id = b.role_id AND b.role_id = a.role_id
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_account SET last_error_count = last_error_count + 1, last_error_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_account SET last_login_ip = #{ip}, last_login_time = now(), last_error_count = 0, WHERE id = #{id}
